subject: Add comprehensive notification support for web platforms
body:
Implement full notification functionality for web mobile and web desktop:

**Sound & Vibration:**
- Add default notification sound for both web platforms
- Add vibration pattern [200ms, 100ms, 200ms] for web mobile
- Update service worker to include sound and vibration

**Badge Count:**
- Implement Badge API for app icon unread count
- Auto-update badge based on total unread messages across all chats
- Clear badge when user opens chat and marks messages as read
- Add setBadgeCount() and clearBadge() helper functions

**In-App Notifications:**
- Create InAppNotification component with slide-in animation
- Add InAppNotificationContext for global state management
- Show notifications when messages arrive in foreground
- Auto-dismiss after 4 seconds with tap-to-open functionality

**Infrastructure:**
- Update useMessages hook to trigger foreground/background notifications
- Update useChats hook to manage badge count
- Integrate InAppNotificationProvider in root layout
- Update documentation with all notification features

Files changed:
- services/notifications.ts: Add sound, vibration, badge API
- public/sw.js: Update service worker notification options
- components/InAppNotification.tsx: New in-app banner component
- contexts/InAppNotificationContext.tsx: New notification context
- hooks/useMessages.ts: Add notification triggers
- hooks/useChats.ts: Add badge count management
- app/_layout.tsx: Add InAppNotificationProvider
- CLAUDE.md: Document notification features
title: Add comprehensive notification support for web platforms
